skillTiers.name: Gift of Life
skillTiers.description: Close the wounds and replenish the lost vigor of all close allies with a curing light.

skillTiers.name: Fiery Strikes
skillTiers.description: Charge heavenly power in your attacks to deal serious injuries and burns. {^y}Apply this skill to your left mouse button.{^n}{^y}Hits twice when used on melee range.{^n}{^y}Cooldown is reduced with more skill points.

skillTiers.name: Pure Heart
skillTiers.description: Strong-willed warriors always prevail when fighting for what they believe.

skillTiers.name: Merit of Heroism
skillTiers.description: Establish yourself in history as a hero incarnating holiness and invicibility.{^n}{^y}Scales infinitely beyond the maximum level. Provides only bonuses when beyond the maximum level.

skillTiers.name: Punishment
skillTiers.description: Those who attempt to stop beneficence are sentenced to a punishment deserving of their sins.

skillTiers.name: Torchbearer's Bastion
skillTiers.description: Wield your aegis as a victorious symbol, bolstering your defense and increasing the damage of your strikes. {^n}{^y}Requires a shield.

skillTiers.name: Godly Presence
skillTiers.description: Powerful radiant energy emanates from you, strengthening all friendly entities.{^n}{^a}Cannot be dispelled.

skillTiers.name: Crystal Balls
skillTiers.description: Sends a wave of crystalline projectiles, imbued with elemental magic which damages enemies on contact.{^n}{^y}Each level also increases the maximum distance of the crystal balls.

skillTiers.name: Depraved Act
skillTiers.description: {^g}Skill Modifier{^n}{^w}Go against the teachings of the light, sacrificing a part of your humanity for achieving higher power.

skillTiers.name: Guilt
skillTiers.description: Regardless of the option they choose, your enemies shall regret their wretchedness.

skillTiers.name: Screen of Light
skillTiers.description: Assault your opponents with a violent flash of blinding light that weakens them and spreads to nearby enemies at light's speed.

skillTiers.name: Skyward Shock
skillTiers.description: Invisible forces from the sky upgrade your crystals to cripple the vital energy from your foes faster.

skillTiers.name: Destiny Shield
skillTiers.description: Canalize your righteous energy into a layer of light that wraps your body and severly harms enemies that come into contact with it.

skillTiers.name: Radiant Orb
skillTiers.description: Creates a veil of light that absorbs a certain quantity of physical damage until it breaks.

skillTiers.name: Celestial Armory
skillTiers.description: Bless all the weapons in range with a powerful angelic enchantment.

skillTiers.name: Numbing Magic
skillTiers.description: Your foes get dazed and confused, which greatly stifles their fighting ability.

skillTiers.name: Siphon
skillTiers.description: Use the energy of your enemies against them with a new siphonic proprety for your fiery attacks.

skillTiers.name: Vigor Reaper
skillTiers.description: A little-known magical technique that consists in making the energy hidden deep inside your enemies surface, giving you full control over it.

skillTiers.name: Reciprocate
skillTiers.description: An eye for an eye, a tooth for a tooth. Anyone who attempts to harm you suffers just as much pain.

skillTiers.name: Celerity
skillTiers.description: Empower your shield with a spell that grants great speed and agility.

skillTiers.name: Diamond Rage
skillTiers.description: Diminishes the mental resources required to conjure the crystal balls.

skillTiers.name: Angelic Altar
skillTiers.description: Summon a heavenly shrine, which casts a large protective aura that lasts until the altar expires or breaks.{^n}{^a}Cannot be dispelled.

initialSkill.name: Angelic Altar
initialSkill.description: Summon a heavenly shrine, which casts a large protective aura that lasts until the altar expires or breaks.{^n}{^a}Cannot be dispelled.

Angelic Altar.name: Angelic Altar
Angelic Altar.description: Summon a heavenly shrine, which casts a large protective aura that lasts until the altar expires or breaks.{^n}{^a}Cannot be dispelled.

skillTiers.name: Heavenly Order
skillTiers.description: Call upon the skies to summon an archangel to assist you in your journey. Later levels unlock new spells for her to use.

Blessing.name: Blessing
Blessing.description: Close the wounds and replenish the lost vigor of all close allies with a curing light.

Transcendence.name: Transcendence
Transcendence.description: Increased damage for a small duration.

Dodge Attacks.name: Dodge Attacks
Dodge Attacks.description: Even the sturdiest armor has its chinks.  The best way to stay alive is to not get hit.

skillTiers.name: Barricade
skillTiers.description: {^g}Skill Modifier{^n}{^w}Weave incredible amounts of light into your shield, building up an unbreakable defense. However, this additional layer of protection comes at a price; the shielded allies must invest more physical effort to make any kind of movement.

skillTiers.name: Fury of the Skies
skillTiers.description: The altar channels a powerful thunder which bounces to all nearby targets, seriously damaging them.

skillTiers.name: Strength Bestowal
skillTiers.description: Lend great amounts of power to a unique ally, allowing them to wreak havoc for a short period of time.

skillTiers.name: Swift Retribution
skillTiers.description: {^g}Skill Modifier{^n}{^w}Conjure heavenly vengance upon your foes.

skillTiers.name: Guardian Angel
skillTiers.description: The sole presence of the purest being fosters hope and empowers allied units.{^n}{^a}Cannot be dispelled.

skillTiers.name: Exertion
skillTiers.description: Exhaust the stamina of your enemies, making them unable to proprely attack or defend themselves.

skillTiers.name: Painkiller
skillTiers.description: The best tool to survive is an unbreakable resolve.

skillTiers.name: Purity
skillTiers.description: Push the limits of a mortal envelope further, banishing all evil from within the target's soul.

skillTiers.name: Deiform
skillTiers.description: You've retained your powers until now, but now is the time to make the enemies falter for good.

skillTiers.name: Berserker's Wrath
skillTiers.description: Give up logical thinking for brute strength, unleashing attacks of greater force.

skillTiers.name: Battle Momentum
skillTiers.description: The act of fighting awakens the truculent warrior inside you, unlocking the full potential of your fighting skills in the heat of the battle. {^y}Apply this skill to your left mouse button.

skillTiers.name: Warlord's Challenge
skillTiers.description: Taunt and weaken enemies with a fierce battle shout.

skillTiers.name: Master at Arms
skillTiers.description: Your natural fighting skills simply put you above any warrior you encounter, both in terms of offensive and defensive proficiency.

skillTiers.name: Tyrant's Shout
skillTiers.description: {^g}Skill Modifier{^n}{^w}This technique prioritizes raw damage output over usability to ensure that enemies are taken down before they pose a threat.

skillTiers.name: Ambidexterity
skillTiers.description: Learn to effectively use two weapons and attack with both at the same time.{^n}{^y}Requires dual-wield.

attributes.requiredWeapons: Dual Wield Only, Sword, Axe, Mace, Thrown Weapon

skillTiers.name: Earthshock
skillTiers.description: Slam the ground with extreme power, breaking the soil beneath your enemies.{^n}{^y}Requires a melee weapon or a staff.

skillTiers.name: Combat Spirit
skillTiers.description: As an expert of melee weaponry and a fighting veteran, you inspire your allies to conquer and seek greater challenges.

skillTiers.name: Purge
skillTiers.description: For a short moment, you are able to ignore grave injuries, preventing wounds and detrimental effects from lasting.{^n}{^y}Does not interrupt ongoing effects.{^n}{^y}Cooldown is reduced with more skill points.

skillTiers.name: Metal Daze
skillTiers.description: Killing an enemy has a chance to cast around you a whirlwind of blades that damages any unit nearby.{^n}{^y}Requires a melee weapon.

castSkills.name: Metal Daze
castSkills.description: Killing an enemy has a chance to cast around you a whirlwind of blades that damages any unit nearby.{^n}{^y}Requires a melee weapon.

skillTiers.name: Mutilating Edge
skillTiers.description: You strike violently, making a sanguine river flow; a bloodbath for your slain opponents to rot in.{^n}{^y}Requires either a melee or a one-handed ranged weapon.

attributes.requiredWeapons: Sword, Spear, Axe, Mace, Thrown Weapon

skillTiers.name: Battleground's Menace
skillTiers.description: Your indescribable wrath further incapacitates those enraged by the shout.

skillTiers.name: Ferocity
skillTiers.description: Even when critically injured, you ignore the pain and open wounds to carry on with an unquestionable will to survive and a triumphant resolve.{^n}{^y}Remains active while health is low.{^n}{^a}Cannot be dispelled.

skillTiers.name: Inhumane Physique
skillTiers.description: Strengthened constitution enhances the weapon proficiency of all allied units, allowing them to place critical strikes every so often.

skillTiers.name: Dash
skillTiers.description: To seize the advantage in combat, rush to an enemy and attack it with a powerful bash of your weapon. Such quick attacks effectively catch foes off guard and go through their defences.{^n}{^y}Requires a melee weapon.

skillTiers.name: Impairing Hits
skillTiers.description: {^g}Skill Modifier{^n}{^w}Your fast swings confuse your foes who cannot foresee your next actions. Such strikes, however, are no crushing blows and therefore cause lesser wounds.

skillTiers.name: Determination
skillTiers.description: A hero's tale is never written in one day. To develop skills worthy of a legend, one must display an unconditional determination.

skillTiers.name: Slash Flurry
skillTiers.description: Hack your foes to pieces with this powerful dual-wielding technique, cutting through limbs like paper. {^n}{^y}Requires dual-wield.

skillTiers.name: Landslide
skillTiers.description: The rumbling stones of Earthshock inflict open wounds and slow enemies down.

skillTiers.name: Treacherous Javelin
skillTiers.description: Mark your target for certain demise with a piercing javelin throw.{^n}{^y}Each level also increases the maximum distance of the javelin.

skillTiers.name: Nerves of Steel
skillTiers.description: Physical injuries barely affect your fighting skills, as you remain surprisingly steady and focused, even in times of crisis.

skillTiers.name: Barrage
skillTiers.description: Rapidly throw a flurry of weapons at your victims, bombarding them with unavoidable, flesh-cutting projectiles.{^n}{^y}Requires dual-wielding ranged weapons.

skillTiers.name: Hemorrhage
skillTiers.description: Various strategies are used to cause grave bleeding, though barbarians often opt for the least subtle one: continuously striking hard.

skillTiers.name: Undying Fury
skillTiers.description: Reduce all damage taken for a short period of time, continuing on a battle even against all odds.

skillTiers.name: Cleave
skillTiers.description: Wide and swift swings of your weapon enables multiple hits to all nearby enemies.

skillTiers.name: Champion of the Pit
skillTiers.description: Years spent undefeated in the arena made you into a warrior of unprecedented resolve and talent.

skillTiers.name: Steadfast Nature
skillTiers.description: Naturally unwavering and resilient, you always find the courage to continue the fight.

skillTiers.name: Blade Blaze
skillTiers.description: Attack with a blind rage, slaughtering a single victim with an avalanche of violent blows.{^n}{^y}Requires dual-wielding melee weapons.

skillTiers.name: Stab Wound
skillTiers.description: Whet your bladed weapons to inflict deeper wounds.{^n}{^y}Requires a sword, a thrown weapon or a spear.

skillTiers.name: Whirling Blades
skillTiers.description: A secret technique of the elite bladedancers, which allows you to spin around and hit all nearby enemies.{^n}{^y}Requires dual-wielding melee weapons.

attributes.requiredWeapons: Dual Wield Only, Sword, Axe, Mace

skillTiers.name: Mayhem
skillTiers.description: {^g}Skill Modifier{^n}{^w}Unleash thunderous destruction from ripping the ground apart.

skillTiers.name: Untamable
skillTiers.description: The wrath of the barbarians turns them into uncontrollable killing machines.

skillTiers.name: Overpower
skillTiers.description: Increased physical strength allows you to use heavy armor and lift your shield with less effort, thus making its usage more efficient.

skillTiers.name: Block
skillTiers.description: For a brief moment, protect yourself inside an unbreakable wall of stone, nullifying all incoming damage. The enemies who attempt to attack you may get momentarily stunned.

skillTiers.name: Boulder Toss
skillTiers.description: Quickly bring dirt and rocky mass together to form a large boulder and hurl it at your opponents.

skillTiers.name: Boon of Stone
skillTiers.description: Heroes using two-handed weapons can take on the way of Geomancy as well, and receive unique blessings to help them quicken their learning.{^n}{^y}Requires a staff or a bow.

skillTiers.name: Staggering Force
skillTiers.description: Geomancers' remarkable display of physical strength is capable of grinding bones into mere dust.{^n}{^y}Requires an axe or a club.

skillTiers.name: Sharpstone Veil
skillTiers.description: A set of razor-sharp rocks quickly orbits around you, reducing incoming damage and injuring nearby opponents.

skillTiers.name: Aftershock
skillTiers.description: {^g}Skill Modifier{^n}{^w}Extends the duration of the stone barrier briefly, granting it a painful revenge on those who strike it. However, it will consume your entire reserve of energy.

skillTiers.name: Shatter
skillTiers.description: This shield technique can hit multiple targets in front of you, dealing high damage and incapacitating their skills. {^n}{^y}Requires a shield.

skillTiers.name: Worldbuilder's Aura
skillTiers.description: Connecting to the very core of nature serves as both a protective ward and an empowering essence.{^n}{^a}Cannot be dispelled.

skillTiers.name: Summon Stone Golem
skillTiers.description: Give life to mere pieces of stone and form a powerful golem that will fight by your side.

Rough Edges.name: Rough Edges
Rough Edges.description: By becoming familiar with the chaos, your whole body suffers drastic changes. Among other things, your blood turns impure and protects you from dark magic.

skillTiers.name: Shield Expertise
skillTiers.description: Block with your shield with unmatched dexterity to minimize the chances of getting injured. {^n}{^y}Requires a shield.

skillTiers.name: Original Creation
skillTiers.description: Geomancers' ancient knowledge allows them to create a temporary connection to the core elements of nature, lessening the damage they and their allies take.

skillTiers.name: King of the Summit
skillTiers.description: Lord and ruler of high summits, you may command your minions to victory with an inspiring presence that no one could immitate.{^n}{^a}Cannot be dispelled.

skillTiers.name: Bedrock
skillTiers.description: Build your golem out of the deepest rocks in the Earth's crust to make it more resistant to damage.

skillTiers.name: Orogenesis
skillTiers.description: Sharpstone Veil may be used more often, but it also becomes more energy-hungry.

skillTiers.name: Violent Bash
skillTiers.description: A ruthless, bone-crushing shield technique which reduces enemies' resilience as well as their precision. {^n}{^y}Requires a shield.

skillTiers.name: Quake
skillTiers.description: The impact of your boulders emits an hindering shockwave that impacts your enemies' fighting skills. In order to be triggered, the impact of the boulder must hit at least one target.

skillTiers.name: Impervious
skillTiers.description: Inspire your allies and grant them physical retaliation, which causes enemies to falter whenever they attempt to attack in close combat.

skillTiers.name: Earthen Energy
skillTiers.description: Knowledge and practice allow geomancers to manage and harness their energy better.

skillTiers.name: Stone Hurler
skillTiers.description: Your golem may now toss large boulders at your opponents.

skillTiers.name: Fissure
skillTiers.description: Deliver a mighty blow on the ground to break the soil under your ennemies and damage them.

skillTiers.name: Stoneskin
skillTiers.description: Makes your skin as hard as stone, diminishing the effectiveness of all piercing attacks used on you.

skillTiers.name: Entrench
skillTiers.description: The unbreakable might of the Geomancers is to be feared, as it allow them and their allies to survive restless assaults.

skillTiers.name: Pressurize
skillTiers.description: Rush at an enemy and pulverize it with a disabling shield slam. {^n}{^y}Requires a shield.

skillTiers.name: Shockwave
skillTiers.description: Gives your golem the ability to shake the Earth with his brute force.

skillTiers.name: Craggy Edges
skillTiers.description: Sharp rocky edges pierce your opponents, leaving their armor damaged and hinder their movement for longer.

skillTiers.name: Primordial Force
skillTiers.description: Your link to nature grows stronger than ever, keeping your life forces and resolve at high levels.

skillTiers.name: Titan Form
skillTiers.description: Funnel the energy of the Earth into your body to turn into a powerful titan that possesses strength comparable to the original creators.

skillTiers.name: Heracles
skillTiers.description: With your one-in-a-million strength, restlessly harass your enemies with shield attacks.

skillTiers.name: Sundering
skillTiers.description: Seismic forces awake as you strike to unfurl calamitous damage.

skillTiers.name: Seismic Strength
skillTiers.description: Charge the power of the Earth in your weapons, incapacitating multiple foes in a single attack. Later levels increase the number of targets hit at once. {^y}Apply this skill to your left mouse button.{^n}{^y}Requires a melee weapon.

skillTiers.name: Meteorite
skillTiers.description: {^g}Skill Modifier{^n}{^w}Your boulder becomes a molten rock, splitting into smaller fragments upon impact, dealing high fire damage but no longer provides a reliable way to stun enemies.

skillTiers.name: Rubblemaker
skillTiers.description: You hit your foes precisely where it causes the most damage, and in turn, you become very efficient at dismantling mechanical devices.

skillTiers.name: Poison Weapons
skillTiers.description: Profound knowledge of alchemy allowed you to develop a potent poison that brings deadly effects in mere seconds.

skillTiers.name: Build Automaton
skillTiers.description: Use scrap metal pieces to form a fully customizable battle automaton that obeys your orders and proves itself immensely powerful in battle.

skillTiers.name: Archive Studies
skillTiers.description: After reading thousands of volumes and tomes, you hold the knowledge of the world in your hands, granting you increased cunning and intelligence.

skillTiers.name: Invigorate
skillTiers.description: Power up a friendly unit or yourself with an empowering enhancement that allows the receiver to inflict electrical shocks with every attacks while the effect lasts.

skillTiers.name: Nature Familiarity
skillTiers.description: Your past studies on biology prove useful during your journey, when it comes to knowing how to better deal with beasts and plants alike.

skillTiers.name: Electrical Field
skillTiers.description: Cast a zone of electrifying energy, damaging enemies who find themselves caught in its radius.

skillTiers.name: Sprockets
skillTiers.description: Study closely the plans of your automaton to figure new possible improvements to speed up its movements.

skillTiers.name: Technological Advancement
skillTiers.description: Your knowledge and innovation give your weapons and gear an edge over your opponents.

skillTiers.name: Electrodynamics
skillTiers.description: {^g}Skill Modifier{^n}{^w}Craft a more potent variant of the electrical net that discharges quicker and needs more preparation time.

skillTiers.name: Corrode
skillTiers.description: Enhance the poison with burning acid that melts both flesh and bones.

skillTiers.name: Atomic Burst
skillTiers.description: An atom-powered beam, infused with the power of electricity and poison, bounces from target to target at lightning speed. {^n}{^y}Scales infinitely beyond the maximum level.

skillTiers.name: Build Bolt Trap
skillTiers.description: Create a durable trap, which shoots poisonous piercing projectiles in all directions. Later levels increase the summon limit.

Build Bolt Trap.name: Build Bolt Trap
Build Bolt Trap.description: Create a durable trap, which shoots poisonous piercing projectiles in all directions. Later levels increase the summon limit.

skillTiers.name: Emergency Plan
skillTiers.description: In case things don't go according to plan, this smokescreen allows you to escape almost any situation.

skillTiers.name: Genes Alteration
skillTiers.description: Become able to improve the genetical structure of your allies for global improvements on their organism.

skillTiers.name: Ingenuity
skillTiers.description: With great experience, you learn how to do more with less resources.

skillTiers.name: Powered Weapons
skillTiers.description: {^g}Skill Modifier{^n}{^w}Invent a method of constantly charging your blade. Liquids, however, won't sustain on the electrified surface as well as on bright iron.

skillTiers.name: Spinning Gears
skillTiers.description: Implement rotating gears, allowing your automaton to attack multiple enemies at once.

skillTiers.name: Mutagen Prototype
skillTiers.description: An injection of this serum empowers the attacks of its user with vicious poison, however, the dangerous substance filling their bodies lowers the odds of their survival. Use with caution.

skillTiers.name: Chemical Explosion
skillTiers.description: Various chemicals react violently when mixed together and produce an explosion of dangerous acid.

skillTiers.name: Magnetize
skillTiers.description: The strong magnetism inside the field prevents enemies from leaving it, alongside an increase in electrical damage it deals.

skillTiers.name: Antidote
skillTiers.description: Mastering the art of elixir-making, you are able to create an antidote which protects you from toxins and life-decaying attacks.

skillTiers.name: Radioactive Core
skillTiers.description: Install a core of radioactive energy at the center of your automaton, causing irreparable damage to anyone standing too close.

skillTiers.name: Build Electric Trap
skillTiers.description: Create a durable trap, which shoots stunning, charged projectiles, splitting into smaller fragments on contact. Later levels increase the summon limit.

Build Electric Trap.name: Build Electric Trap
Build Electric Trap.description: Create a durable trap, which shoots stunning, charged projectiles, splitting into smaller fragments on contact. Later levels increase the summon limit.

skillTiers.name: Dazing Bacteria
skillTiers.description: Organisms infected by dangerous bacteria are afflicted with terrible side effects that make fighting a much harder task.

skillTiers.name: Miracle Solution
skillTiers.description: The best savants are resourceful and can achieve wonders with their skills.

skillTiers.name: EMP
skillTiers.description: The automaton generates its own energy and can project stored electricity in the form of an electromagnetic pulse; the implosion severely electrifies anyone caught in the radius and disrupts any positive buffs.

skillTiers.name: Advanced Armor Craftsmanship
skillTiers.description: Develop your skills in steel-working by crafting customized armor parts for your familiars' protection. Those armor pieces are perfectly adjusted to them and will not slow them down.{^n}{^a}Cannot be dispelled.

skillTiers.name: Hazardous Alteration
skillTiers.description: {^g}Skill Modifier{^n}{^w}The mutagen's effects last for much longer, however it doesn't come without drawbacks to the user.

skillTiers.name: Nanovirus
skillTiers.description: Send out nanomachines, which implant themselves in the heads your opponents, damaging their mind and causing long-lasting injuries.

skillTiers.name: Black Widow
skillTiers.description: Even the smallest dose of this substance heavily cripples anyone struck by a weapon covered in it.

skillTiers.name: Last Stage
skillTiers.description: Ill and weak, your enemies can already feel the reaper's touch.

skillTiers.name: Death Pulse
skillTiers.description: A ring of flesh-reaping energy violently strikes any foes around you.

skillTiers.name: Twisted Mind
skillTiers.description: Your sanity slowly fades away, resulting in havoc-wreaking prowess along with loss of empathy.

skillTiers.name: Befoul Weapons
skillTiers.description: The corruption growing inside you allows you to imbue your weapons with chaotic power.

skillTiers.name: Impure Blood
skillTiers.description: By becoming familiar with the chaos, your whole body suffers drastic changes. Among other things, your blood turns impure and protects you from dark magic.

skillTiers.name: Dreadful Impact
skillTiers.description: Sends forth a wave of chaotic power that damages the body and the mind alike.{^n}{^y}Cooldown is reduced with more skill points.

skillTiers.name: Augmented Reflexes
skillTiers.description: Increases your stamina to incredible levels, allowing you to stay on the offensive.

skillTiers.name: Obscure Crescent
skillTiers.description: Reap the foes in front of you with a slashing attack.{^n}{^y}Requires a melee weapon.

skillTiers.name: Scream
skillTiers.description: Embrace the corrupting chaos and let loose a powerful cry that makes you stronger.

skillTiers.name: Malediction
skillTiers.description: After every blow you land, your enemies may become afflicted by a striking curse that makes them more vulnerable to your chaotic power.

castSkills.name: Malediction
castSkills.description: After every blow you land, your enemies may become afflicted by a striking curse that makes them more vulnerable to your chaotic power.

skillTiers.name: Extreme Pressure
skillTiers.description: The damage of the shock is increased tenfold, leaving your enemies wounded and destabilized.

skillTiers.name: Devil's Rush
skillTiers.description: Rush at an opponent with incredible agility to deliver a reliable and deadly blow.{^n}{^y}Requires a melee weapon.

skillTiers.name: Unleashed Fury
skillTiers.description: The cursed touch of your weapons delivers a quick and gruesome death upon mortal beings.

skillTiers.name: Dividing Magic
skillTiers.description: Focus your arcane consciousness to make your projectiles divide into smaller ones upon impact.{^n}{^y}Requires a staff or a bow.

skillTiers.name: Blood Harvest
skillTiers.description: Augments the speed of the pulse, causing an instant hemorrhage.

skillTiers.name: Power Upsurge
skillTiers.description: Awakens your inner wrath and multiply the strength of all allies for a brief moment.

skillTiers.name: Fleshrender
skillTiers.description: This dual-wielding technique reaps the flesh of your enemies with bloodletting strikes of unprecedented violence.{^n}{^y}Requires dual-wielding.

attributes.requiredWeapons: Dual Wield Only, Sword, Axe, Mace, Thrown Weapon

skillTiers.name: Wrath
skillTiers.description: The rage takes over your mind and rewards violence with more violence. However, your reason, constantly fighting off your inner demons, is quick at taking back control. {^y}Apply this skill to your left mouse button.{^n}{^y}Requires a melee weapon.

skillTiers.name: Eradicate
skillTiers.description: Forces of neither life nor death can escape your wrath.

skillTiers.name: Torturer's Delight
skillTiers.description: {^g}Skill Modifier{^n}{^w}The sole satisfaction of inflicting agonizing wounds upon multiple foes allows you to carry on the slaughter.

skillTiers.name: Demon's Gift
skillTiers.description: Exceeding energy permeates your mind and reinforces your soul to overcome adversity with ease.

skillTiers.name: Sanguine Blast
skillTiers.description: Canalize a fusion of chaotic power and demon blood into a powerful laser that seeks a poor creature and destroys it from the inside.{^n}{^y}Requires a staff.

skillTiers.name: Chaos Release
skillTiers.description: Exteriorize your chaotic powers in the form of a magical projectile and hurl it at your foes. Around the area of explosion, targets will suffer great pain and be dispelled of all buffs.

skillTiers.name: Frenzy
skillTiers.description: Every cast of Death Pulse has a chance to recharge the skill almost instantly.

skillTiers.name: Darkening Haze
skillTiers.description: {^g}Skill Modifier{^n}{^w}When one becomes dehumanized with the power of chaos, life has no worth when it is compared to promises of greater power.

skillTiers.name: Everlasting Hatred
skillTiers.description: Overwhelming power fills your thoughts with rancor and hatred.

skillTiers.name: Corruption
skillTiers.description: An aura of terror gathers around you; foes daring to approach can neither remain brave nor unscarred for too long.

skillTiers.name: Insignia of Anguish
skillTiers.description: Starving forces of the underworld reach out to the ground's surface and corrupt the ground with hellish signs, eliminating anyone who gets too close.

skillTiers.name: Atrocity
skillTiers.description: Desensitized as you have become, cruelty is now second nature.

skillTiers.name: Hellborn
skillTiers.description: {^g}Skill Modifier{^n}{^w}Although sibling to the mortal race, gazing into the depths of hell will quickly prove that you and the hellspawns have much more in common than you initially thought.

skillTiers.name: Shadow Riposte
skillTiers.description: Each blow you take can unleash a burst of concentrated dark magic that eradicates all nearby forms of life.

skillTiers.name: Pandemonium
skillTiers.description: Offer your whole self to the chaotic forces. Submerge your conscience in darkness. Allow it to increase your damage tremendously, but only for a mere moment.

skillTiers.name: Frozen Sigils
skillTiers.description: {^g}Skill Modifier{^n}{^w}Bring forth a bone-breaking, frozen hell by creating sigils which explode almost instantly in an icy chaos.

skillTiers.name: Target Practice
skillTiers.description: Learn to remain steady and shoot under all conditions and from all angles to always hit the mark.{^n}{^y}Requires a ranged weapon.

skillTiers.name: Raptor Hunter
skillTiers.description: Call upon a bird of prey to assist you in hunting down your victims.

Dodge Attacks.name: Dodge Attacks
Dodge Attacks.description: Even the sturdiest armor has its chinks.  The best way to stay alive is to not get hit.

skillTiers.name: Hunting Net
skillTiers.description: Throw a hunting net, entangling an enemy, preventing them from taking a single step for a duration, as well as heavily reducing their damage output.

skillTiers.name: Eagle Eye
skillTiers.description: Firing rapidly allows you to enter a state of increased focus, replenishing your energy with ease and increasing the piercing damage of your projectiles. {^y}Apply this skill to your left mouse button.{^n}{^y}Requires a ranged weapon.

skillTiers.name: Razor Sharpening
skillTiers.description: Increase the piercing potential of the weapons of the nearby allied units.{^n}{^y}Requires a bow, a thrown weapon, a sword or a spear.

skillTiers.name: Magical Winds
skillTiers.description: Concentrate a great amount of magical energy in a single, powerful projectile that damages all enemies in its path.{^n}{^y}Requires a ranged weapon.{^n}{^y}Transfers flat damage outside of the wielded weapon.

skillTiers.name: Monster Hunter
skillTiers.description: Special training allows you to face all kinds of demons and giants with no hesitation.

skillTiers.name: Two for One
skillTiers.description: Learn a more efficient way to fire your arrows which allows you to rapidly shoot two arrows in sequence.{^n}{^y}Requires a bow.

skillTiers.name: Bloodletting
skillTiers.description: Become an expert at causing internal bleeding with specialized fighting techniques using piercing weapons.

skillTiers.name: Blinding Winds
skillTiers.description: Intense rays of light emerge from your projectiles, which blind your enemies, making them unable to aim properly or defend themselves.

skillTiers.name: Split Shots
skillTiers.description: This special technique allows you to fire multiple projectiles at once to manage large groups more easily.{^n}{^y}Requires either a bow or a thrown weapon.

skillTiers.name: Intimidating Screech
skillTiers.description: The raptor's screech sends a shivering wave, which lowers enemies' resistance and damage dealt for a short while.

skillTiers.name: Bandages
skillTiers.description: While you venture in unknown regions, carrying a pack of bandages is useful, as they are effective for protecting wounds from aggravating and enable accelerated recovery. Additonally, they may be used on allied units.{^n}{^a}Cannot be dispelled.

skillTiers.name: Acute Precision
skillTiers.description: The projectiles of your ranged weapons pass through enemies and deal increased piercing damage.

skillTiers.name: Ranger's Prowess
skillTiers.description: Rangers can share their techniques with companions and allies, improving their damage output and speed for a short moment.

attributes.requiredWeapons: Sword, Spear, Staff, Bow, Thrown Weapon

skillTiers.name: Silver Feathers
skillTiers.description: Your raptor may now throw its piercing feathers to damage enemies from afar and disturb their eyesight.

skillTiers.name: Storm of Arrows
skillTiers.description: Firing multiple arrows up in the sky allows unavoidable attacks from unsuspected angles.{^y} Inflicts damage twice per second.{^n}{^y}Requires a ranged weapon.{^n}{^y}Transfers flat damage outside of the wielded weapon.

skillTiers.name: Survival Techniques
skillTiers.description: As a master of survival in the wild, you may teach your allies the basics of survivability; this knowledge can be applied in combat to avoid more attacks than a regular fighter would.{^n}{^a}Cannot be dispelled.

skillTiers.name: Languid Death
skillTiers.description: With hunter's profound knowledge of poison lore, you find ingredients to prepare deadly substances which infect wounds, preventing them from regenerating.

skillTiers.name: Vampire Shots
skillTiers.description: {^g}Skill Modifier{^n}{^w}Upgrade your magical shots to drain life from your enemies and restore yours. This technique, however, will greatly increase the energy required to cast the skill.

skillTiers.name: Divine Defiance
skillTiers.description: The resolve of a monster slayer amplifies equally to the greatness of the challenge before them.

skillTiers.name: Scavenger
skillTiers.description: Feeding on the flesh of its sufferers and tracking those who attempt to flee becomes trivial to the most relentless raptors.

skillTiers.name: Tempest
skillTiers.description: Arrows flying through the sky absorb the elemental energy and deliver it on your unfortunate enemies.

skillTiers.name: Headshot
skillTiers.description: Shots perfectly aimed at the head may cause critical damage and knock out enemies.

skillTiers.name: Scorching Edge
skillTiers.description: {^g}Passive Modifier{^n}{^w}Instead of sharpening your arrows, you dip them into ignited oil to melt your opponent's armor. However, the tar-like complexion of the arrow will make it dull.{^n}{^y}Requires a bow.

skillTiers.name: Devastating Shots
skillTiers.description: Perfected skills with ranged weapons allows you to aim where your opponents least expect it in a blink of an eye and deal extraordinary damage.{^n}{^y}Requires either a bow or a thrown weapon.

skillTiers.name: Light Armor Specialist
skillTiers.description: Learn how to adjust and customize the armor pieces of you and your allies, allowing for faster movement and an increase in durability.

skillTiers.name: Ominous Arrows
skillTiers.description: Multiple piercing arrows, imbued with dreadful essence, explode in a small burst upon contact.{^n}{^y}Requires a ranged weapon.{^n}{^y}Transfers flat damage outside of the wielded weapon.

skillTiers.name: Expertise
skillTiers.description: Great focus and awareness allows you to overuse your abilities and overwhelm your enemies.

skillTiers.name: Dragon Arrow
skillTiers.description: Launch a scorching, fiery arrow that explodes upon hitting the first enemy it encounters and deals a great deal of burn damage over time.{^n}{^y}Requires a ranged weapon.{^n}{^y}Transfers flat damage outside of the wielded weapon.

skillTiers.name: Astuteness
skillTiers.description: Having more cunning and cleverness than your opponents allows you to use different defensive strategies to outsmart your foes.

skillTiers.name: Confined Technique
skillTiers.description: {^g}Skill Modifier{^n}{^w}Studying the dark arts, your arrows become ethereal and they tear their victims soul apart, albeit not their body.

skillTiers.name: Oceanic Might
skillTiers.description: The power of the ocean is invoked in your every fourth hit, blasting enemies with a powerful jet of water that instantly turns to ice. {^y}Apply this skill to your left mouse button.

skillTiers.name: Mark of the Trident
skillTiers.description: Mastery of trident-like weapons has been a vital part of all Aquamancers' studies, thus improving their overall ability with using spears.{^n}{^y}Requires a spear.

skillTiers.name: Aquamancer's Bounty
skillTiers.description: Temporarily increase your own power, or permeate an ally with the teachings of aquamancy, granting them control over water, even despite their lack of knowledge in this school of magic.{^n}{^y}Cooldown is reduced with more skill points.

skillTiers.name: Summon Water Spirit
skillTiers.description: You call upon a water spirit from the depths of an ocean that will follow you and aid you in taking down monsters with cold water. Later levels increase the summon limit.

Water Pulse.name: Water Pulse
Water Pulse.description: Summon a colossal, circular wave of water around you, violently disabling everyone caught in it.

Impermanence.name: Impermanence
Impermanence.description: Even the sturdiest armor has its chinks.  The best way to stay alive is to not get hit.

skillTiers.name: Hypothermia
skillTiers.description: Lingering frost is brought upon your enemies, ensuring a slow and certain demise, crippling both the tough and the weak.

skillTiers.name: Shore Uprising
skillTiers.description: Deliver a blow of concentrated water with the pressure capable of breaking bones.{^n}{^y}Cooldown is reduced with more skill points.

skillTiers.name: Environmental Adaptation
skillTiers.description: Your body adapts to living in most climates and conditions; dry land, pollution and even underwater.

skillTiers.name: Breathe Underwater
skillTiers.description: Aquamancers have the blessing of being kings in the underwater kingdom. Take advantage of this gift by creating a small pool of water in which you can recollect your strength for a few moments. While inside, you cannot move nor directly attack your enemies, however.{^n}{^a}Cannot be dispelled.

skillTiers.name: Rust
skillTiers.description: Concentrated water pulses cause metal armor to rust, almost completely negating its effectiveness.

skillTiers.name: Tsunami Spin
skillTiers.description: A technique reserved to spear-wielders. This trick allows you to hit two enemies twice in a single attack.{^n}{^y}Requires a spear.

skillTiers.name: Engulfment
skillTiers.description: A better understanding of aquamancy permits the extension of the duration of your blessings.

skillTiers.name: Surf
skillTiers.description: Assemble waves of gargantuan proportions, increasing the area over which damage is inflicted, the number of projectiles and their chance to pass through enemies.

skillTiers.name: Scaly Skin
skillTiers.description: Your skin becomes scaly and resilient, similar to that of a reptile, yet doesn't diminish your agility.

skillTiers.name: Hoarfrost
skillTiers.description: Conjure frost to trap your enemies in a thick layer of ice, preventing them to move or fight back but also protecting them from your own attacks.

skillTiers.name: Rain
skillTiers.description: Cast large torrents of water on a specific zone, assaulting any hostile units with a cold and drenching rain.

skillTiers.name: Wash Out
skillTiers.description: Blast enemies with a destabilizing pulse of water, effectively worsening the victims' fighting skills.

skillTiers.name: Absolute Zero
skillTiers.description: Masterful control over water and ice allows your magic to reach the lowest temperatures.

skillTiers.name: Ire of Storms
skillTiers.description: Heeding the call of the storms, your surging tides, ever increasing in power, are now allied with the wrath of the tempest.

skillTiers.name: Hurricane's Spirit
skillTiers.description: With improved control over the water, cast a small but powerful vortex of water around you, similar to a hurricane, that will disable nearby enemies with its strong, chilling winds.

skillTiers.name: Flash Freeze
skillTiers.description: When using a ranged weapon, imbue your shots with biting cold, capable of freezing and impaling multiple targets at once.{^n}{^y}Requires a ranged weapon.

skillTiers.name: Torrential Flow
skillTiers.description: Invoking rain with strength of a waterfall allows you to crush foes with immense power.

skillTiers.name: Magical Sea Sources
skillTiers.description: Spirits born from enchanted water sources are able to use an enhanced arsenal of spells, alongside a life-leeching ability.

skillTiers.name: Lunge
skillTiers.description: Dive forward and attack violently in melee range, and do so with unexisting cooldown constraints, allowing you to quickly travel around the battleground.{^n}{^y}Requires a melee weapon.

skillTiers.name: Tidal Wave
skillTiers.description: Summon a colossal, circular wave of water around you, violently disabling everyone caught in it.

skillTiers.name: Acid Rain
skillTiers.description: {^g}Skill Modifier{^n}{^w}Toxic and acidic water chips away at your enemies' life force and resistances.

skillTiers.name: Tempest Spear
skillTiers.description: A strong technique only usable by spear-wielders. Learn how to strike an enemy thrice in a row with unmatched speed and tempestuous force.{^n}{^y}Requires a spear.

skillTiers.name: Water Rapids
skillTiers.description: {^g}Skill Modifier{^n}{^w}Mirroring the nature of water, your familiars are as fast as currents, yet as unstable as a lake's surface.

skillTiers.name: Impale
skillTiers.description: Thrust your weapon forward to pierce through your enemies at a blinding speed, which results into lethal bloodbaths.{^n}{^y}Requires a spear.

skillTiers.name: Regenerative Shell
skillTiers.description: Preventively creates an envelope of protective energy, blocking most attacks and reducing potential damage inflicted by hostile sources.

skillTiers.name: Dangerous Waters
skillTiers.description: The indomitable seas submerge your enemies in the coldest waves, freezing their whole bodies.

skillTiers.name: Hydrothermal Explosion
skillTiers.description: Heat the water beneath the soil, causing a geyser to erupt, scorching anything that comes in contact with it.

skillTiers.name: Aphotic Chasm
skillTiers.description: Draw the remaining bits of unexploited power from the deepest abyss of the seas, only accessible to the elite aquamancers, to exhaust and enfeeble monsters with enormous pressure.

skillTiers.name: Summon Undead Minion
skillTiers.description: Invoke a weak but obedient skeletal pawn to fight for you for a short period of time. Later levels increase the summon limit.

Early Grave.name: Early Grave
Early Grave.description: Although Necromancers rely on vicious magic, which tortures their foes to death, they always find a way to quicken the process.

skillTiers.name: Forbidden Codex
skillTiers.description: Study the archives of the Forbidden Codex, learning how to best utilize all sorts of weapons. Necromancers can put this knowledge into practice, which can ultimately give them an advantage in combat.

skillTiers.name: Banishing Spell
skillTiers.description: This surge of shadow energy effectively defeats the living and the dead alike.{^n}{^y}Cooldown is reduced with more skill points.

skillTiers.name: Cold Hand of Death
skillTiers.description: Cold and chilling magic wraps around the weapons of you and your allies, desecrating the foes touched by them with necrotic power.

skillTiers.name: Summon Undead Archer
skillTiers.description: Invoke a skeletal archer that targets weak points and makes your opponents bleed for a short period of time. Later levels increase the summon limit.

Early Grave.name: Early Grave
Early Grave.description: Although Necromancers rely on vicious magic, which tortures their foes to death, they always find a way to quicken the process.

skillTiers.name: Skull Grenade
skillTiers.description: Throw a skull imbued with torturous fear, causing foes to panic, and in turn, becoming easy targets.{^n}{^y}Cooldown is reduced with more skill points.

skillTiers.name: Vanquish Undead
skillTiers.description: Learn how to fend off the undead efficiently with a special aura that increases control over them.

skillTiers.name: Early Grave
skillTiers.description: Although Necromancers rely on vicious magic, which tortures their foes to death, they always find a way to quicken the process.

skillTiers.name: Summon Undead Wizard
skillTiers.description: Invoke a long-dead wizard that casts powerful spells for a short period of time. Later levels increase the summon limit.

Early Grave.name: Early Grave
Early Grave.description: Although Necromancers rely on vicious magic, which tortures their foes to death, they always find a way to quicken the process.

skillTiers.name: Impaling Bones
skillTiers.description: Raises a row of piercing bone spires that tears your opponents' flesh.

skillTiers.name: Bone Cage
skillTiers.description: Snares your opponents in a cage of piercing bones, preventing any movement for a short while.

skillTiers.name: Mana Source
skillTiers.description: Grants you the ability to gather magical energy out of seemingly nothing, empowering yourself and allowing you to cast spells tirelessly.

skillTiers.name: Skeletal Armor
skillTiers.description: Adding a layer of hardened bones on top of your armor pieces proves itself useful to increase your survivability on the battlefield.

skillTiers.name: Summon Undead Captain
skillTiers.description: Invoke an ancient commander to inspire its allies for a short period of time.

initialSkill.name: Rally
initialSkill.description: The resolute call of your horn can turn the tide of battle, inspiring all in its range to fight with renewed vitality.

Rally.name: Rally
Rally.description: The resolute call of your horn can turn the tide of battle, inspiring all in its range to fight with renewed vitality.

Early Grave.name: Early Grave
Early Grave.description: Although Necromancers rely on vicious magic, which tortures their foes to death, they always find a way to quicken the process.

skillTiers.name: Doom Sealing
skillTiers.description: The bone spires, now inhabited by ghostly forces, terrorize and disrupt your opponents' spellcasting.

skillTiers.name: Deathshield
skillTiers.description: Improve your ward to give protection from revenants' attacks and to expand reserves of mana.

skillTiers.name: Soul Chill
skillTiers.description: Terrorize the very souls of your opponents with a chilling enchantment reserved to the strongest necromancers.

skillTiers.name: Death Ray
skillTiers.description: Cast large amounts of necrotic energy into a small area that will soon explode with soul-crushing darkness.

skillTiers.name: Skewer
skillTiers.description: The row of sharpened bones becomes more effective at cutting flesh.

skillTiers.name: Gravestone
skillTiers.description: Leave an enchanted, cursed gravestone as a grim reminder of what awaits your enemies.

skillTiers.name: Degeneracy
skillTiers.description: Augmented necrotic magic saps the vitality of your ensnared victims.

skillTiers.name: Reaper's Avatar
skillTiers.description: Further embody the emblem of death and claim lives with unrivaled efficiency.

skillTiers.name: Eternal Slumber
skillTiers.description: The final hour has come, and your enemies feel a cold, painful embrace that will carry them to their eternal rest.

skillTiers.name: Ossein Recovery
skillTiers.description: Fortify the bones of allied entities and render them more resistant to all blows.{^n}{^a}Cannot be dispelled.

skillTiers.name: Soulflaying Magic
skillTiers.description: {^g}Skill Modifier{^n}{^w}Allows you to trade off all the physical pain for spiritual dolor, effectively increasing the damage done to your opponents' spirits but also decreases the damage done to their bodies.

skillTiers.name: Impenetrable Ossuary
skillTiers.description: {^g}Skill Modifier{^n}{^w}The bone cage becomes much harder to break, prolonging its duration, yet inevitably protecting the enemies trapped inside.

skillTiers.name: Spellbound Souls
skillTiers.description: Your countless victims are bound to your supremacy, obliged to serve you as a ward from incoming attacks.

skillTiers.name: Devour Soul
skillTiers.description: A power from the darkness that allows you to destroy a soul in an instant and use its energy to recover your own.

skillTiers.name: Life Guzzler
skillTiers.description: Greedily devour the vitality of an opponent when you land the killing blow, and distribute it to all nearby allies. Later levels increase the amount of health resotored and the energy cost.{^n}{^y}Although the skill costs energy, it can still be activated when the energy cost is not met.

castSkills.name: Life Guzzler
castSkills.description: Greedily devour the vitality of an opponent when you land the killing blow, and distribute it to all nearby allies. Later levels increase the amount of health resotored and the energy cost.{^n}{^y}Although the skill costs energy, it can still be activated when the energy cost is not met.

skillTiers.name: Necromania
skillTiers.description: Awakening the undead makes their past regrets and vengeful desires reappear.

skillTiers.name: Energy Rush
skillTiers.description: Overflowing with energy, your spells grow much more potent for a short period of time.

skillTiers.name: Second Chance
skillTiers.description: Your time has not yet come; become temporarily nearly invincible and recover a large portion of your health to give yourself another chance when all seems lost.

skillTiers.name: Young Years
skillTiers.description: Remain quick-witted like in your youth, eager to experience and learn from your mistakes, all with a childlike curiosity.

skillTiers.name: Temporal Energy
skillTiers.description: Wrap your weapons with ardent flux that causes lasting injuries upon contact.

skillTiers.name: Abiding Majesty
skillTiers.description: Decades of practice have created a link between you and the universe, to a point where handling magical energy becomes easier than ever.

skillTiers.name: Echo
skillTiers.description: Hurl a fast-travelling whirl of pain that, when it touches an enemy, hurts them with injuries from past battles.

skillTiers.name: Perenniality
skillTiers.description: An eternity spent fighting has rendered you partially insensible to pain.

skillTiers.name: Mend Wounds
skillTiers.description: Greatly speed up the natural process of cicatrization, allowing to efficiently recover health, even in the midst of the battle.

skillTiers.name: Interdimensional Breach
skillTiers.description: Tear a gap in your reality, allowing you to disappear and sneakily attack unaware victims.{^n}{^y}Requires a melee weapon.

skillTiers.name: Excellency
skillTiers.description: You have ascended to another level of being that allows you to see the world differently and progress with no barriers.

skillTiers.name: Eye of the Mind
skillTiers.description: Your mindfulness allows you to predict your enemies' movements and always stay a step ahead of them.

skillTiers.name: Hourglass of Waning
skillTiers.description: Turn the tides of time against your foes, aging them into foreseeable and feeble fools.

skillTiers.name: Synchronism
skillTiers.description: Attacking the same enemy in multiple timelines with perfect synchronization can multiply the number of projectiles of your staff attacks.{^n}{^y}Requires a staff.

skillTiers.name: Cosmic Nebula
skillTiers.description: Summon raging clouds of gas, alike cosmic nebulas, to obscure enemies' vision and burn their bodies in a relentless pursuit. {^n}{^y}This pet is invincible.

initialSkill.name: Cosmic Nebula
initialSkill.description: Summon raging clouds of gas, alike cosmic nebulas, to obscure enemies' vision and burn their bodies in a relentless pursuit. {^n}{^y}This pet is invincible.

Cosmic Nebula.name: Cosmic Nebula
Cosmic Nebula.description: Summon raging clouds of gas, alike cosmic nebulas, to obscure enemies' vision and burn their bodies in a relentless pursuit. {^n}{^y}This pet is invincible.

skillTiers.name: Carve Reality
skillTiers.description: Perfected skills allow your echoes to explode over a larger radius and travel at lightspeed.

skillTiers.name: Time Freeze
skillTiers.description: Send a wave of temporal energy that immobilizes enemies in time and space, leaving them open to attacks.

skillTiers.name: Slowing Rift
skillTiers.description: Massively slow down nearby foes with a wide field that distorts the current timeline in its area of effect.

skillTiers.name: Devitalize
skillTiers.description: {^g}Skill Modifier{^n}{^w}Channel some of your lifetime into your weapon to augment the ardent flux surrounding it.

skillTiers.name: Seeker
skillTiers.description: The summoned nebulas move quicker between enemies and burn them gravely.

skillTiers.name: Chronophage
skillTiers.description: When your magic collides with hostile enemies, their movements are hindered and sometimes halted, and in result become unable to keep up with your reality.

skillTiers.name: Celestial Quintessence
skillTiers.description: Stellar energy gathers in your weapon, increasing all elemental damage dealt.

skillTiers.name: Quickening
skillTiers.description: Share your time-controlling power with your minions, allowing them to use their skills more often.

skillTiers.name: Timeless Power
skillTiers.description: {^g}Skill Modifier{^n}{^w}Uncover a technique which channels your weapon's physical damage into an unending electrical torture.

skillTiers.name: Rise of the Ancestors
skillTiers.description: Invoke powerful mages from the past era to take up fight anew alongside you. Those sorcerors can only be kept under your control for a brief moment.

initialSkill.name: Forgotten Knowledge
initialSkill.description: The spirits imbue you and your allies with long-lost secrets from the past, increasing all magical potential.

skillTiers.name: Accelerate
skillTiers.description: As you master controlling the flow of time, you become able to accelerate your own reality.

skillTiers.name: Bewildering Speed
skillTiers.description: The energy from the distorted rift allows you to move at a higher speed, yet the enemies caught in it, who can't control it as well, get severely burnt and electrocuted.

skillTiers.name: Astral Mergence
skillTiers.description: Connect to an alternative timeline, in order to briefly combine the powers with your other self.

skillTiers.name: Timeless Sorcery
skillTiers.description: Strengthen the connection between the past and the present, binding the ancestors to your will for much longer.

skillTiers.name: Upheaved Time
skillTiers.description: Redefine the laws of time and effortlessly assault your foes with memories that will harm evermore.

skillTiers.name: Infinite Eternity
skillTiers.description: Afflict a single enemy with a malediction that will last for eons, permanently turning it into decrepified prey with which the Timetraveller can toy with. The only way out of this malediction is to either die or have it dispelled.

skillTiers.name: Stasis
skillTiers.description: Cage yourself within a barrier of celestial energy and put yourself in stasis to protect yourself from all damage and negative effects.{^n}{^a}Cannot be dispelled.{^n}{^y}Cooldown is reduced with more skill points.

skillTiers.name: Gravity Nova
skillTiers.description: Modify the rules of time in a circular area, shattering and imploding everything inside.

skillTiers.name: Eternize
skillTiers.description: Inflict wounds which cause your enemies to suffer eternally.

skillTiers.name: Forgotten Knowledge
skillTiers.description: The spirits imbue you and your allies with long-lost secrets from the past, increasing all magical potential.

skillTiers.name: School of Fire
skillTiers.description: Learn the secrets of emberlike, scorching spells, empowering all fire-based attacks around you.

skillTiers.name: School of Frost
skillTiers.description: Learn the secrets of cold, chilling magic, boosting the lethality of all frost-based attacks near you.

skillTiers.name: School of Lightning
skillTiers.description: Learn the secrets of thunderous, electrifying spells, multiplying the strength of all lightning-based attacks around you.

skillTiers.name: School of Poison
skillTiers.description: Learn the secrets of alchemy and toxins, increasing the potency of all poison-based damage inflicted by you and your allies.

skillTiers.name: School of Shadows
skillTiers.description: Learn the secrets of the dark and chaos, improving the power of all vitality-based attacks near you.

skillTiers.name: Dark Pact
skillTiers.description: {^g}Skill Modifier{^n}{^w}Abandon your own vitality to pursue your quest to find infinite magical power.

skillTiers.name: Triplicate
skillTiers.description: Your staff attacks get divided into three projectiles, increasing your area of attack.{^n}{^y}Requires a staff.

skillTiers.name: Magic Gems
skillTiers.description: Throw a set of magical gemstones at your opponents, releasing the stored tempestuous energy.

skillTiers.name: Rot Zone
skillTiers.description: Plague the air of an area, to spread disease and death to those that inhale it.

skillTiers.name: Ice Blockade
skillTiers.description: Form a wide, slow-moving wall of frost energy, damaging anything that passes through it.

skillTiers.name: Arcane Flare
skillTiers.description: A magical ball of flames flies out and explodes on the targeted area, dealing mediocre damage if thrown aimlessly, but becomes deadly when precisely landing on an enemy.

skillTiers.name: Conjured Steel
skillTiers.description: Expert sorcerers are able to masterfully imbue all sorts of items with magic, even steel-crafted weapons.{^n}{^y}Requires any weapon that is not a staff.

attributes.requiredWeapons: Sword, Spear, Axe, Mace, Bow, Thrown Weapon

skillTiers.name: Supercharged Amethysts
skillTiers.description: {^g}Skill Modifier{^n}{^w}Charge a part of the gems in your palms, making them petrify the targets they come in contact with, however the damage of those gems gets completely nullified.

skillTiers.name: Sever Minds
skillTiers.description: A shocking, darkened blast which shatters the minds of nearby foes into pieces.{^n}{^y}Cooldown is reduced with more skill points.{^n}{^y}Scales infinitely beyond the maximum level.

skillTiers.name: Reload
skillTiers.description: With great practice, learn how to effectively recharge your abilities in the midst of the combat and enable deadly spell combos.{^n}{^y}Does not affect skills granted from items or artifacts.

skillTiers.name: Heat Wave
skillTiers.description: A blast of burning energy has a chance to be released around you after killing an enemy with Arcane Flare, for increased area damage.

castSkills.name: Fire Nova
castSkills.description: Sends out a ring of flames that ignites everything in the area.

skillTiers.name: Cone of Flames
skillTiers.description: Unleash a violent blast of fire, which burns to the bone the enemies it touches.

skillTiers.name: Intense Frost
skillTiers.description: Freeze the opponents that cross your frost barrier on the spot, and increase the frost damage of your spell.

skillTiers.name: Electrostatic Veil
skillTiers.description: When the situation calls for it, create an electrical veil around you, granting new energy to fight despite the hopelessness.{^n}{^y}Remains active while health is low.{^n}{^a}Cannot be dispelled.

skillTiers.name: Infinite Reach
skillTiers.description: Your spell has now an extended reach, allowing it to travel much further than usual.{^n}{^y}Every level increases the distance travelled by the wave.

skillTiers.name: Bouncing Plague
skillTiers.description: Whenever Rot Zone inflicts damage, it will throw poisonous bolts towards the enemies near you, extending the plague's area of effect.

skillTiers.name: Inner Turmoil
skillTiers.description: An explosion centered on the first target of your spell which devastates the psyches of all enemies caught in it.

skillTiers.name: Archmage's Cloak
skillTiers.description: Those who understand the root of magic itself can utilize its power to increase their stamina and vitality alike.

skillTiers.name: Ice Lance
skillTiers.description: Conjure a long and sharp block of ice that can be tossed like a javelin that explodes over a small area.{^n}{^y}Transfers flat damage outside of the wielded weapon.

skillTiers.name: Horror
skillTiers.description: Make fear and doubt arise in hearts of your victims, crippling and preventing them from counter-attacking.

skillTiers.name: Outburst
skillTiers.description: Release stored lightning energy to blast all nearby enemies, draining their energy and causing severe electrocutions.

skillTiers.name: Magma Barrier
skillTiers.description: Make magmatic stones rise from the ground, blocking the path of your enemies and burning them with intense heat.{^n}{^y}The aura does not activate if there is no enemy nearby.

skillTiers.name: Physical Ward
skillTiers.description: Upon taking damage, there's a chance that a defensive ward forms around you, protecting you from physical and piercing damage.

skillTiers.name: Cryopulverization
skillTiers.description: The ice javelin breaks with increased violence and shatters into sharp icicles.

skillTiers.name: Gall Bomb
skillTiers.description: A dangerous acidic concoction composed of self-crafted elixirs imbued with magic becomes an explosive weapon, useful at disrupting enemies.

skillTiers.name: Elemental Dominion
skillTiers.description: Merge the power of storms, blizzards and volcanos into a single, powerful aura that empowers you with unthinkable elemental power.

skillTiers.name: Magical Catastrophe
skillTiers.description: In an attempt to produce the most powerful magic technique, fuse the power of all schools of magic into a singular, powerful pulse of arcane power, disintegrating everything in range.{^n}{^y}Requires a staff.

skillTiers.name: Lay Waste
skillTiers.description: Make flames and cinder surge from the ground with a mighty blow and burn all enemies in a cone-shaped area in front of you.

skillTiers.name: Lavawrought Arsenal
skillTiers.description: Forged in the flames of beyond, your weapons cannot be compared to the mortal-crafted weapons, as they never grow dull and deal injuries that can never be fully healed.

skillTiers.name: Brand of Destruction
skillTiers.description: To unfold destruction, the Destructor uses its finest weapon in its arsenal : a magical layer of elemental energy wrapping any weapon to increase its damaging potential.

skillTiers.name: Inferno
skillTiers.description: The intensity of your battles heatens up your weapons to a point that they can cause grievous burns every fourth attack. {^y}Apply this skill to your left mouse button.

skillTiers.name: Haste
skillTiers.description: Rush forward in the direction you are facing to quickly join the battle or run away to safety.{^n}{^y}Cooldown is reduced with more skill points.

skillTiers.name: Lust for Battle
skillTiers.description: While winning fights is a common occurrence for a Destroyer, it never gets boring to them. Every time you defeat an enemy, there is a small chance that you restore health a small amount of health and energy. The amount restored depends on the level of this skill.

castSkills.name: Lust for Battle
castSkills.description: While winning fights is a common occurrence for a Destroyer, it never gets boring to them. Every time you defeat an enemy, there is a small chance that you restore health a small amount of health and energy. The amount restored depends on the level of this skill.

skillTiers.name: Ravager's Enmity
skillTiers.description: The beings that threaten the world are cold-hearted and feared by all but the foolish. Such reputation is only earned by the accumulation of more power.

skillTiers.name: Control Loss
skillTiers.description: {^g}Skill Modifier{^n}{^w}You can access greater realms of power seemingly at will, but when too much power is in reach, it's easy to lose control and become drained and maddened.

skillTiers.name: Prepare for Combat
skillTiers.description: Before the fight, some fighters can enter a mental state in which they become unshakable and battle-ready.

skillTiers.name: Convection
skillTiers.description: Increased burning power ignites your enemies with unbearable heat and allows you to fuel your power.

skillTiers.name: Fulminating Blast
skillTiers.description: Striking an enemy with all your power, it overflows in the form of a blast of fiery energy and strikes nearby enemies.

skillTiers.name: Warborne
skillTiers.description: Having spent the most of your existence on the battlefield, you can always call a warzone "home".

skillTiers.name: Bladestorm
skillTiers.description: The thunderous energy inscribed in your weapon is unleashed with this weapon technique allowing you to hit at most five enemies with great lightning damage at the cost of lower damage of other types.{^n}{^y}Requires a melee weapon.

skillTiers.name: Razing Arc
skillTiers.description: A storm of destructive energy spins around you to engulf all nearby enemies with fire and lightning.

skillTiers.name: Shocking Armor
skillTiers.description: The rare souls courageous enough to even land a blow on the Destroyer inevitably regret their action as they get afflicted by unbearable pain and become drained of energy.

skillTiers.name: Maximal Firepower
skillTiers.description: Unleash unbridled power to produce a blazing aura that increases the damage you and your allies can inflict.

skillTiers.name: Viciousness
skillTiers.description: Mercy is for the weakminded, and no Destructor is weakminded.

skillTiers.name: Void Rip
skillTiers.description: Powers from uncharted dimensions cannot escape your grasp, as you can wield them to augment your superiority on the battlefield.

skillTiers.name: Genocide
skillTiers.description: One who wishes to live should hide from the gaze of the Destroyer, in hope to be spared from the wrath of calamitous powers that wear down foes of any strength.

skillTiers.name: Thunder Sparks
skillTiers.description: Volatile electrical energy heeds the call of your fury, adding up to the power of your Earth Smashes and fries your enemies from the inside.

skillTiers.name: Hand of God
skillTiers.description: Abuse your power by smiting a single enemy with unseen might, just like the divine beings ever would. {^n}{^y}Requires a melee weapon.

skillTiers.name: Scions of Embers
skillTiers.description: The lord of destruction has his personal army of fiery minions to assist him in fighting. When an weakling enemy is vanquished, one of your minions can rise from the ashes and fight for a short period of time.

castSkills.name: Blessing of Jin Chan
castSkills.description: The blessings of Jin Chan are upon you, granting a chance for additional boons for every enemy slain.{^n}{^Y} Can trigger on enemy death.

skillTiers.name: Evilminded Ancestry
skillTiers.description: A whole lineage precedes the author of calamities, and with every generation, descendants grow exponentially stronger.

skillTiers.name: Dissonance
skillTiers.description: Pulsing destruction takes form inside your enemies, conflicting with their own thoughts. Indecisive and disrupted, they become unable to take decisions or think clearly, turning them into diminished threats.

skillTiers.name: Flash
skillTiers.description: Destructors have a reputation of delivering swift and unpredictable counter-attacks.

skillTiers.name: Globe of Fiery Tenebrosity
skillTiers.description: Exert all your magical power to conjure a ball of volatile fiery power, and hurl it at your foes. Upon hitting an enemy, the magic explodes over a wide area and inflicts a long-lasting debuff on all enemies in the area.

skillTiers.name: Globe of Electrical Tenebrosity
skillTiers.description: Exert all your magical power to conjure a ball of volatile electrical power, and hurl it at your foes. Upon hitting an enemy, the magic explodes over a wide area and inflicts a long-lasting debuff on all enemies in the area.

skillTiers.name: Overthrow
skillTiers.description: The Destroyer is never easily stopped in its step, bringing down even the strongest foes with ease.

skillTiers.name: The Power Overwhelming
skillTiers.description: The culmination of your destructive powers does not exist, and so has always been the way of Destructors.{^n}{^y}Scales infinitely beyond the maximum level.

skillTiers.name: Mana Reservoir
skillTiers.description: With your every attack, you can increase your energy limit for a few moments. {^y}Apply this skill to your left mouse button.

skillTiers.name: Overkill
skillTiers.description: Perhaps all this violence isnt necessary, but the forces of evil deserve no less.

skillTiers.name: Birth of the Flameforged
skillTiers.description: Your strongest minions can take form in this world in the form of a colossal golem of magma and rock.
